quote.text: The most beautiful thing a woman can wear is confidence lit by purpose.
quote.author: Arlene Leonie

scripture.text: I have loved you with an everlasting love; I have drawn you with unfailing kindness.

message:
Hey Ms Sunshine ☀️💖

I just want you to know...you did so well today. Even if sometimes you don’t feel like it ...you did.

All I ever want is for you to be happy... The kind of happy that's not forced but the one that grows from peace... joy that no one can take away because it lives deep in your spirit.

You are the most precious thing in this world to me. Please never forget that.

No matter what you’re facing, what you’re feeling, or how messy life gets... I’ll be here. Cheering for you. Covering you in prayer. Holding space for you

You were born to light this world up. And I will always, always believe in you. 💗
